___dead_features.description: map of declared optional features that are dead with the time points in which are dead in case of evolution, empty list otherwise.

additionalProperties.description: List of time points in which optional feature are dead (i.e., can not be selected). Empty in case of no evolution.

___false_optionals.description: map of declared optional features that are false optionals with the time points in which are false optionals in case of evolution, empty list otherwise.

additionalProperties.description: List of time points in which optional feature are false optionals (i.e., must be selected). Empty in case of no evolution.
